short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beautiful new tab page with a midnight aurora theme, clock, date, search bar, and quick links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab page into a beautiful, customizable dashboard with Midnight Aurora. This extension features:

• Stunning aurora animation background
• Large clock and date display
• Quick web search
• Customizable quick links with favicons
• Drag-and-drop link reordering

Boost your productivity and enjoy a visually pleasing browsing experience with every new tab. Personalize your workflow and access your favorite sites instantly.
